pageTitle: Patagonia Kids' Woolly Hat | Trailheads: Black
textBeforeTable: Boys' and Girls' Sizing Information Fit Guide Size Chart Reviews We promote fair labor practices, safe working conditions and environmental responsibility throughout the Patagonia supply chain. Below are the suppliers that impact the Patagonia Kids' Woolly Hat View our supply chain The Footprint Chronicles® Made in China. 82 g (2.9 oz) Outer: 80% wool (chlorine-free)/20% nylon. Lining: 100% polyester brushed fleece Traditional Nordic styling with a ball tassel on top and extended ties Extended earflaps for warmth Chlorine-free wool/nylon blend exterior with fleece interior for warmth and comfort The
